channel.title: Great idea!
channel.description:
ok i have this idea how to "hack" runescape , and we use packet editting...ok here it goes:
ok we should use WPE pro, a good packet editter.
now if we take an amount of the bank, lets say 5gp.the servers says that this particular account receives 5gp and so the computer receives and sends packets in the meanwhile.what if we find the packet that does the 5gp in the account.well, we could send it like a thousand times so everytime the packets get send we get 5gp !! :eek:
ok , would this work?? just post what you think of this idea
if i see lots of positive feedback il search a group of people who will work on this and hope we actualy get this working :D

item.title: Great idea!
item.dc:creator: @Dizzy Dizzy
item.description:
@Dizzy wrote:

Let me help you guys out.

IMPOSSIBLE

Yes, impossible, in bold.

Instead of just saying drop it (because many other people already said that and if I say it it would just be spam), I’m going to say, forget about will ya?

Here’s why:

Think outside of the box, not only will it detect fake packets and/or edited packets, before you even withdraw/pickup/deposit/etc. the coins, the server gets the amount of coins, saves it to a temporary memory, THEN gives you the coins. So before it even sends the packet it knows how much you picked up.

Other way of thinking it (also simplified for people who watch the Emperor’s new groove and/or school, lol):
You clicky object, you sendy packet, sever receivies packet, server savies packet, server sendies packet, you receivey packet, DONE.

So, if you edit it it first, the server will say, “Hey, there’s not that many coins in your bank”. If you edit after, “Err, sorry dude, I remember that you didn’t have that much.” You edit your coins in bank then try to withdraw, “Umm, when you opened your bank, it said you had 5 coins, not 9,999,999…”

Simple enough? Sorry I can’t get any simpler at the moment.

Quick review!: picky, sendy, savey, sendy, DONE-E.

Like I said before, this is just out of the box thinking, so it might not be correct. (Hell it probally doesn’t even make sense.)

Read full topic

item.description:
@Aftermath.v2 wrote:

[quote=“Zach1188, post:24, topic:14173”]Forget about it. Hacking Runescape can’t and won’t be done. Anyone who has the skill do actually hack Runescape would not waste their time on a kids game.

Packet editing wont work. Even if somehow you managed to decrypt the packets, it still will not work. The Runescape servers detect whether or not the amount of gold you pick up is legit.

Not going to happen, period. Your best bet is to auto.[/quote]
